trans-unit.target: 可以通过比较其 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 属性的值来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTime.Compare%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTime.Compare%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
Determines whether one specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> represents a date and time that is the same as or earlier than another specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="t1" /> is the same as or earlier than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <xref:System.DateTime.op_LessThanOrEqual%2A> operator determines the relationship between two <xref:System.DateTime> values by comparing their number of ticks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.op_LessThanOrEqual%2A>运算符确定两个之间的关系<xref:System.DateTime>通过比较其计时周期数的值。

trans-unit.source: Before comparing <xref:System.DateTime> objects, make sure that the objects represent times in the same time zone.
trans-unit.target: 然后再比较<xref:System.DateTime>对象，请确保这些对象表示在相同的时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by comparing the values of their <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过比较其 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 属性的值来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTime.Compare%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTime.Compare%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or<see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> from a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
The date and time value to subtract from (the minuend).
The date and time value to subtract (the subtrahend).
Subtracts a specified date and time from another specified date and time and returns a time interval.
The time interval between <paramref name="d1" /> and <paramref name="d2" />; that is, <paramref name="d1" /> minus <paramref name="d2" />.

The <xref:System.DateTime.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29> method does not consider the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the two <xref:System.DateTime> values when performing the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.DateTime%29>方法不考虑的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>这两个属性<xref:System.DateTime>值时执行减法。

trans-unit.source: Before subtracting <xref:System.DateTime> objects, ensure that the objects represent times in the same time zone.
trans-unit.target: 相减之前<xref:System.DateTime>对象，请确保这些对象表示在相同的时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result will include the difference between time zones.
trans-unit.target: 否则，结果将包括时区之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does consider the difference between time zones when performing the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法一定会考虑执行减法时的时区之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A> method and the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A>方法和减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to subtract from.
The time interval to subtract.
Subtracts a specified time interval from a specified date and time and returns a new date and time.
An object whose value is the value of <paramref name="d" /> minus the value of <paramref name="t" />.
This method subtracts the ticks value of `t` from the ticks value of `d`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中的刻度值减去`t`的刻度值`d`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A> method and the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A>方法和减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" />.
Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent.

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string by using the conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用当前区域性的约定分析日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%29> overload
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%29> 重载

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string by using the conventions of a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用特定区域性的约定分析日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> overload (see [Parsing and Cultural Conventions](#Culture))
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 重载 (请参阅[分析以及文化习俗](#Culture))

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string with special style elements (such as white space or no white space).
trans-unit.target: 分析 （如空白或没有空白） 的特殊的样式元素的日期和时间字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> 重载

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string that must be in a particular format.
trans-unit.target: 分析必须采用特定格式的日期和时间字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string and perform a conversion to UTC or local time.
trans-unit.target: 分析日期和时间字符串并执行转换为 UTC 或本地时间。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> 重载

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string without handling exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 分析而不处理异常的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法

trans-unit.source: Restore (round-trip) a date and time value created by a formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 还原 （往返） 创建的日期和时间值的格式设置操作。

trans-unit.source: Pass the "o" or "r" standard format string to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method, and call the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload with <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: "O"或"r"标准格式将字符串传递给<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法，并且调用<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>重载 <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Parse a date and time string in a fixed format across machine (and possibly cultural) boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 跨计算机 （和可能区域性） 的边界分析固定格式的日期和时间字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或<xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法

trans-unit.source: The string to parse
trans-unit.target: 要分析的字符串

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method tries to convert the string representation of a date and time value to its <xref:System.DateTime> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法尝试将转换到的日期和时间值的字符串表示其<xref:System.DateTime>等效。

trans-unit.source: It tries to parse the input string completely without throwing a <xref:System.FormatException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 它尝试完全分析的输入的字符串，而不引发<xref:System.FormatException>异常。

trans-unit.source: If the parsing operation fails because of an unrecognized string format, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>, whereas the <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在分析操作失败由于无法识别的字符串格式，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.FormatException>，而<xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A>方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because exception handling can be expensive, you should use <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> when the parsing operation is expected to succeed because the input source is trusted.
trans-unit.target: 由于异常处理可能很昂贵，您应使用<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>时应在分析操作成功，因为输入的源是受信任。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A> is preferable when parsing failures are likely, particularly because an input source is not trusted, or you have reasonable default values to substitute for strings that do not parse successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A> 当分析失败可能时，特别是因为的输入的源不受信任，或你拥有的合理的默认值，用于替换无法成功分析的字符串，则更为可取。

trans-unit.source: The string to be parsed can take any of the following forms:
trans-unit.target: 要分析的字符串可以采用以下形式之一：

trans-unit.source: A string with a date and a time component.
trans-unit.target: 具有日期和时间部分字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date but no time component.
trans-unit.target: 包含日期但不包含时间组成部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the time component is absent, the method assumes 12:00 midnight.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间组件不存在，则该方法假定午夜 12:00。

trans-unit.source: If the date component has a two-digit year, it is converted to a year based on the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the current culture's current calendar or the specified culture's current calendar (if you use an overload with a non-null `provider` argument).
trans-unit.target: 如果的日期部分具有两位数年份，它将转换为基于年份<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的当前区域性的当前日历或指定的区域性的当前日历 (如果你使用非 null 的重载`provider`自变量)。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date component that includes only the month and the year but no day component.
trans-unit.target: 带有包括仅月份和年份的日期组件但不包含日期组成部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the first day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 该方法假定该月的第一天。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date component that includes only the month and the day but no year component.
trans-unit.target: 带有包括仅月和日的日期组件，但没有年份部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current year.
trans-unit.target: 该方法假定当前年份。

trans-unit.source: A string with a time but no date component.
trans-unit.target: 带有时间而不包含日期组成部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current date unless you call the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload and include <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001.
trans-unit.target: 该方法假定当前日期，除非调用<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>重载并包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`styles`自变量，在其中用例方法采用的 1 月 1 日的日期 0001。

trans-unit.source: A string with a time component that includes only the hour and an AM/PM designator, with no date component.
trans-unit.target: 带有时间组件包含仅的小时和 AM/PM 指示符，与不包含日期组成部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current date and a time with no minutes and no seconds.
trans-unit.target: 该方法假定当前日期和时间的任何分钟，没有秒数。

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload and include <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用来更改此行为<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>重载并包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`styles`自变量，在其中用例方法采用的 1 月 1 日的日期 0001。

trans-unit.source: A string that includes time zone information and conforms to ISO 8601.
trans-unit.target: 包含时区信息且符合 ISO 8601 字符串。

trans-unit.source: In the following examples, the first string designates Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), and the second designates the time in a time zone that's seven hours earlier than UTC:
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中，第一个的字符串表示协调世界时 (UTC)，第二个表示为七个小时的时区中的时间早于 UTC:

trans-unit.source: A string that includes the GMT designator and conforms to the RFC 1123 time format; for example:
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包括格林威治标准时间指示符，并符合 RFC 1123 时间格式;例如：

trans-unit.source: A string that includes the date and time along with time zone offset information; for example:
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含的日期和时间以及时区偏移量信息;例如：

trans-unit.source: The following example parses strings in each of these formats by using the formatting conventions of the current culture, which in this case is the en-US culture:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例通过使用当前区域性，在这种情况下即 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定分析在每个这些格式的字符串：

trans-unit.source: If the input string represents a leap day in a leap year in the calendar used by the parsing method (see [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)), the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method parses the string successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的字符串表示闰日闰年中的分析方法使用的日历中 (请参阅[分析和区域性约定](#Culture))，则<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法已成功分析字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the input string represents a leap day in a non-leap year, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的字符串表示闰日中非-闰年，则该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using the formatting rules of the current or a specified culture, trying to parse a string across different cultures can fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法尝试分析的字符串表示形式的日期和时间通过当前或指定的区域性，尝试跨不同区域性中分析字符串的格式设置规则可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: To parse a specific date and time format across different locales, use one of the overloads of the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and provide a format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析跨不同的区域设置特定日期和时间格式，请使用的重载之一<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并提供的格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Parsing and cultural conventions
trans-unit.target: 分析和区域性约定

trans-unit.source: All overloads of the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method are culture-sensitive unless the string to be parsed (which is represented by `s` in the following table) conforms to the ISO 8601 pattern.
trans-unit.target: 所有重载<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法是区分区域性的除非要分析的字符串 (这由`s`下表中) 是否符合 ISO 8601 模式。

trans-unit.source: The parsing operation uses the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is derived as follows:
trans-unit.target: 在分析操作使用中的格式设置信息<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>，如下所示派生的对象：

trans-unit.source: If you call
trans-unit.target: 如果调用

trans-unit.source: And `provider` is
trans-unit.target: 和`provider`是

trans-unit.source: Formatting information is derived from
trans-unit.target: 格式设置信息派生自

trans-unit.source: The current thread culture (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property)
trans-unit.target: 当前线程区域性 (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: The current thread culture (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property)
trans-unit.target: 当前线程区域性 (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: Custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法

trans-unit.source: When formatting information is derived from a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the calendar used in the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置信息从派生时<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义在分析操作中使用的日历。

trans-unit.source: If you parse a date and time string by using a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object with customized settings that are different from those of a standard culture, use the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method to improve the chances for a successful conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用分析日期和时间字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象的自定义不同的标准区域性的设置，请使用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法而不是<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法来提高成功转换的概率。

trans-unit.source: A non-standard date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse.
trans-unit.target: 非标准日期和时间字符串可以很复杂且难以进行分析。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method tries to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法尝试分析多种隐式分析模式，它们都可能会失败的字符串。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法要求你显式指定一个或多个可能会成功的确切的分析模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "DateTimeFormatInfo and Dynamic Data" section in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"DateTimeFormatInfo 和动态数据"部分<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>主题。

trans-unit.source: Note that the formatting conventions for a particular culture are dynamic and can be subject to change.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，针对特定区域性的格式设置约定是动态的并且可能受更改影响。

trans-unit.source: This means that parsing operations that depend on the formatting conventions of the default (current) culture or that specify an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object that represents a culture other than the invariant culture can unexpectedly fail if any of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，依赖于默认 （当前） 区域性或格式设置约定的分析操作指定<xref:System.IFormatProvider>如果发生以下任一情况，可能意外失败表示固定区域性以外区域性的对象：

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data has changed between major or minor versions of the .NET Framework or as the result of an update to the existing version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的数据已更改之间主要或次要版本的.NET framework 或作为对现有的.NET Framework 版本的更新的结果。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data reflects user preferences, which can vary from machine to machine or session to session.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的数据反映用户首选项，从计算机到计算机或会话到另一个会话而异。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data represents a replacement culture that overrides the settings of a standard culture or a custom culture.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的数据表示一个替代的设置的标准区域性或自定义区域性的替换区域性。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the difficulties in parsing data and time strings that are associated with changes in cultural data, you can parse date and time strings by using the invariant culture, or you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> or <xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A> method and specify the exact format of the string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止分析区域性数据中的更改关联的数据和时间字符串的困难，可以通过使用固定区域性，分析日期和时间字符串，也可以调用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>或<xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A>方法并指定所需的格式要分析的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you are serializing and deserializing date and time data, you can either use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture, or you can serialize and deserialize the <xref:System.DateTime> value in a binary format.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要序列化和反序列化的日期和时间数据，你可以使用固定区域性的格式设置约定也可以序列化和反序列化<xref:System.DateTime>以二进制格式的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the "Dynamic culture data" section in the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> topic and the "Persisting DateTime values" section in the <xref:System.DateTime> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"动态区域性数据"部分<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>主题，并将"将日期时间值"部分中<xref:System.DateTime>主题。

trans-unit.source: Parsing and style elements
trans-unit.target: 分析和样式元素

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> overloads ignore leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in the input string (which is represented by `s` in the following table).
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>重载忽略输入字符串中的前导、 内部或尾随空白字符 (这由`s`下表中)。

trans-unit.source: The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ("#", U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000).
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间可以使用一对前导空格和尾随数字符号字符 （"#"，U + 0023），括起来，并可以尾随一个或多个 NULL 字符 (U + 0000)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload has a `styles` parameter that consists of one or more members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>重载具有`styles`包含的一个或多个成员的参数<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举。

trans-unit.source: This parameter defines how `s` should be interpreted and how the parse operation should convert `s` to a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 此参数定义如何`s`应解释和分析操作应将转换如何`s`为日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the effect of each <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> member on the parse operation.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了每个效果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>上分析操作的成员。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成员

trans-unit.source: Effect on conversion
trans-unit.target: 对转换的影响

trans-unit.source: Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 分析`s`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC，，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: - If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal> flag, the method parses the string, calls <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> to convert the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value to UTC, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: -如果`s`包括时区偏移量，或者如果`s`不包含任何时区信息但`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>标志，该方法分析字符串，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>要转换返回<xref:System.DateTime>值赋给UTC，并设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: - If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal> flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: -如果`s`指示它表示 UTC，或如果`s`不包含时区信息但`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>标志，该方法分析字符串，对返回执行任何时区转换<xref:System.DateTime>值，并设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: - In all other cases, the flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: -在所有其他情况下，标记有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Inner white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 内部的空格始终允许的日期和时间元素中`s`。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Leading white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 前导空白字符始终允许的日期和时间元素中`s`。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Trailing white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 尾随空格的日期和时间元素中始终允许`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces.
trans-unit.target: 指定`s`可能包含前导、 内部和尾随空格。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认行为。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration value such as <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None>.
trans-unit.target: 不能重写通过提供限制性更强<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举值，如<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, local time is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 指定，如果`s`缺少假定任何时区信息，本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag is present, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>标志位于<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, UTC is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 指定，如果`s`缺少假定任何时区信息，UTC。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag is present, the method converts the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time and sets its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>标志存在，该方法将返回<xref:System.DateTime>于 UTC 的值为本地时间和设置其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有效，但将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a <xref:System.DateTime> value that represents a local time with its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含时区信息的字符串，尝试阻止的日期和时间字符串的转换<xref:System.DateTime>值，该值表示本地时间的其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, such a string is created by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and by using the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用创建此类字符串<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以及通过使用"o"、"r"或"u"标准格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The return value and DateTime.Kind
trans-unit.target: 返回值和 DateTime.Kind

trans-unit.source: The `DateTime.Parse` overloads return a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind> property includes time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `DateTime.Parse`重载返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind>属性包括时区信息。

trans-unit.source: It can indicate that the time is:
trans-unit.target: 它可能表示的时间：

trans-unit.source: Coordinated Universal Time (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 协调世界时 (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: The time in the local time zone (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 在本地时区内的时间 (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: The time in an unknown time zone (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 未知的时区中的时间 (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName >)。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> object whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象，其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method may also perform time zone conversion and set the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property differently, depending on the values of the `s` and `styles` parameters:
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法还可以执行时区转换并设置的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的值决定以不同方式，`s`和`styles`参数：

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: 如果

trans-unit.source: Time zone conversion
trans-unit.target: 转换时区

trans-unit.source: Kind property
trans-unit.target: 类型的属性

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含时区信息。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is converted to the time in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间转换为时间本地时区。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含时区信息和`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>标志。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains the Z or GMT time zone designator, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含 Z 或格林威治标准时间的时区指示符，和`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind>标志。

trans-unit.source: The date and time are interpreted as UTC.
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间被解释为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts date strings that contain time zone information to the time in the local time zone:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将包含时间中的本地时区的时区信息的日期字符串为：

trans-unit.source: You can also preserve the value of a date and time's <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property during a formatting and parsing operation by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以保留的值的日期和时间的<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的格式设置和通过分析操作期间<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind> flag affects the parsing operation on <xref:System.DateTime> values that are converted to strings by using the "o", "r", or "u" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind>标志会在分析操作影响上<xref:System.DateTime>通过使用"o"、"r"或"u"格式说明符将转换为字符串的值。

trans-unit.source: Numerous examples that call the `DateTime.Parse` method are interspersed throughout the [Remarks](#remarks) section of this article and in the documentation for the individual `DateTime.Parse` overloads.
trans-unit.target: 调用的大量示例`DateTime.Parse`方法散布在整个[备注](#remarks)部分本文以及个人的文档`DateTime.Parse`重载。

trans-unit.source: You can also download a complete set of `DateTime.Parse` examples, which are included in a [.NET Core 2.0 project for C#](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/csharp/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip) and a [.NET Core 2.0 project for Visual Basic](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/visualbasic/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip), from the [dotnet/docs GitHub repository](https://github.com/dotnet/docs).
trans-unit.target: 你也可以下载一组完整的`DateTime.Parse`示例，它包括在[对于 C#.NET 核心 2.0 项目](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/csharp/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip)和[适用于 Visual Basic.NET 核心 2.0 项目](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/visualbasic/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip)，从[dotnet/文档GitHub 存储库](https://github.com/dotnet/docs)。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using the conventions of the current thread culture.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />.

If `s` contains time zone information, this method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts the date and time in `s` to local time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含时区信息，该方法返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并将转换的日期和时间`s`为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it performs no time zone conversion and returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为它不执行任何时区转换，且返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此重载试图分析`s`通过使用当前区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: The current culture is indicated by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture> property.
trans-unit.target: 当前的区域性将由<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture>属性。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting conventions of a specific culture, call the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)> or the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析使用特定区域性的格式设置约定的字符串，调用<xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)>或<xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)>重载。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 此重载试图分析`s`使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following example parses the string representation of several date and time values by:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例分析的字符串表示形式的几个日期和时间值：

trans-unit.source: Using the default format provider, which provides the formatting conventions of hte current thread culture of the computer used to produce the example output.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的格式提供程序，它提供用于生成此示例输出的计算机的当前线程区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: The output from this example reflects the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的输出将反映 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: Using the default style value, which is <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWIthType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认样式值，该值是<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWIthType>。

trans-unit.source: It handles the <xref:System.FormatException> exception that is thrown when the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using some other culture's formatting conventions.
trans-unit.target: 它处理<xref:System.FormatException>方法尝试通过使用某些其他区域性分析的字符串表示形式的日期和时间时引发的异常的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to successfully parse a date and time value that does not use the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何为成功分析不使用当前线程区域性的格式设置约定的日期和时间值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
A string that contains a date and time to convert.
See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
See [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)
Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using culture-specific format information.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" /> as specified by <paramref name="provider" />.

If `s` contains time zone information, this method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts the date and time in `s` to local time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含时区信息，该方法返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并将转换的日期和时间`s`为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it performs no time zone conversion and returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为它不执行任何时区转换，且返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 此重载试图分析`s`使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following example parses an array of date strings by using the conventions of the en-US, fr-FR, and de-DE cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例通过使用 EN-US、 FR-FR，和 DE-DE 区域性的约定分析日期字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates that the string representations of a single date can be interpreted differently across different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 它演示了可以跨不同的区域性以不同的方式解释的字符串表示形式单个日期。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
A string that contains a date and time to convert.
See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
See [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c> for the parse operation to succeed, and that defines how to interpret the parsed date in relation to the current time zone or the current date.
A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using culture-specific format information and a formatting style.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="provider" /> and <paramref name="styles" />.
This method overload converts the date and time in `s` and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载将转换的日期和时间`s`和设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.DateTime>值，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: 如果

trans-unit.source: Time zone conversion
trans-unit.target: 转换时区

trans-unit.source: Kind property
trans-unit.target: 类型的属性

trans-unit.source: `s` contains no time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含没有时区信息。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含时区信息。

trans-unit.source: To the time in the local time zone
trans-unit.target: 为本地时区中的时间

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information, and `styles includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含时区信息，和样式包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: To Coordinated Univeral Time (UTC)
trans-unit.target: 为协调的通用时 (UTC)

trans-unit.source: `s` contains the Z or GMT time zone designator, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含 Z 或格林威治标准时间的时区指示符，和`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method and displays the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法，并显示的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性生成<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
<paramref name="styles" /> contains an invalid combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values.
For example, both <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" />.
Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent.
The format of the string representation must match a specified format exactly or an exception is thrown.
A string that contains a date and time to convert.
A format specifier that defines the required format of <c>s</c>.
For more information, see the Remarks section.
An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="provider" />.

The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式必须是定义的格式的日期`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date> and \<Time> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`, and that `s` have no white space other than that permitted by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求\<日期 > 和\<时间 > 元素的字符串表示形式的日期和时间显示在指定的顺序中`format`，且`s`具有没有空格，而不是允许的`format`.

trans-unit.source: If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> value has a time of midnight (00:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`定义的日期与没有时间元素和分析操作成功，则生成<xref:System.DateTime>值必须在时间内的午夜 (00: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> value has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`定义的时间与没有日期元素，并且分析操作成功，则生成<xref:System.DateTime>值具有日期`DateTime.Now.Date`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does not represent a time in a particular time zone and the parse operation succeeds, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不的表示时间以特定时区和分析操作成功，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does represent the time in a particular time zone and `format` allows time zone information to be present (for example, if `format` is equal to the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers, or if it contains the "z", "zz", or "zzz" custom format specifiers), the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`确实表示特定时区的时间和`format`允许存在的时区信息 (例如，如果`format`等同于"o"、"r"或"u"标准格式说明符，或如果它包含"z"、"zz"或"zzz"自定义格式说明符）<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符`s`。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) or [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)或[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a custom format pattern that does not include date or time separators (such as "yyyyMMddHHmm"), use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是不包含日期或时间分隔符 （如"yyyyMMddHHmm")，可使用的固定区域性的自定义格式模式`provider`参数以及提供给最大形式的每个自定义格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to specify hours in the format pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要指定的格式模式中的小时数，请指定较宽的形式"HH"，而不是较窄的形式，"H"。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和时间符号和字符串 （例如，特定语言线的星期几名称） 中使用`s`由定义`provider`参数，则精确格式`s`如果`format`是标准的格式说明符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示用于解释的区域性`s`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象由其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`s`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns either the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
-or-
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a date and time that corresponds to the pattern specified in <paramref name="format" />.
-or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="s" /> do not agree.

In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" />方法抛出异常<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />如果要分析的字符串包含小时组成部分和 AM/PM 指示符，并不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本中，AM/PM 指示符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a date and time to convert.
A format specifier that defines the required format of <c>s</c>.
For more information, see the Remarks section.
An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that provides additional information about <c>s</c>, about style elements that may be present in <c>s</c>, or about the conversion from <c>s</c> to a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value.
A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified format, culture-specific format information, and style.
The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly or an exception is thrown.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="format" />, <paramref name="provider" />, and <paramref name="style" />.

The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式必须是定义的格式的日期`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the date and time elements in `s` appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求中的日期和时间元素`s`显示在指定的顺序`format`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `style` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不匹配的模式`format`参数，并具有定义的任何变体`style`参数，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式中任何一种识别的格式提供程序的格式的日期<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method also allows the date and time elements in `s` to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法还允许中的日期和时间元素`s`若要按任何顺序出现。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`参数包含仅在时间，并没有日期，当前日期用于除非`style`参数包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，在这种情况下的默认日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`参数包含仅的日期和没有时间、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters.
trans-unit.target: `style`参数还确定是否`s`参数可以包含前导、 内部或尾随空格字符。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用更改此行为<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，它将返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或通过使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，它将返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含时区信息，如有必要，将时间转换为本地时间和<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and to set the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用更改此行为<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志以不将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为本地时间，并设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter defines the required pattern of the `s` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数定义的所需的模式`s`参数。

trans-unit.source: It can consist of either one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table.
trans-unit.target: 它可以包含一个或多个自定义格式说明符从[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表或单个标准格式说明符，它标识预定义的模式，从[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不使用自定义格式模式中的日期或时间分隔符，使用固定区域性的`provider`参数以及提供给最大形式的每个自定义格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要指定模式中的小时数，请指定较宽的形式"HH"，而不是较窄的形式，"H"。

trans-unit.source: Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and specify multiple permitted formats.
trans-unit.target: 而不是要求`s`符合使分析操作成功的一种格式，您可以调用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并指定多种允许的格式。

trans-unit.source: This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 这使得更可能会成功分析操作。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`参数包含一个或多个成员的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>确定是否以及在何处的空白区域未定义的枚举`format`可以出现在`s`和控制分析操作的确切行为。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how each member of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration affects the operation of the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了每个成员的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举会影响的操作<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成员

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 分析`s`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, calls <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> to convert the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value to UTC, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包括时区偏移量，或者如果`s`不包含任何时区信息但`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，该方法分析字符串，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>要转换返回<xref:System.DateTime>为 UTC 值并将设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`指示它表示 UTC，或如果`s`不包含时区信息但`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，该方法分析字符串，对返回执行任何时区转换<xref:System.DateTime>值，并设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，标记有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定义的空白`format`可以出现在任何单个的日期或时间元素之间。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定义的空白`format`可以出现的开始处`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定义的空白`format`可以出现在结尾处`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 指定`s`可能包含前导、 内部和尾随空格未定义的`format`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time.
trans-unit.target: 指定，如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，则假定它表示本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志位于<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC.
trans-unit.target: 指定，如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，则假定它表示 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the method converts the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time and sets its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志存在，该方法将返回<xref:System.DateTime>于 UTC 的值为本地时间和设置其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含时间不包含日期信息的返回值的日期设置为`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using default values.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用默认值分析参数。

trans-unit.source: No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 没有空格，而不是中提供的`format`允许。

trans-unit.source: If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to 1/1/0001.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`缺少返回日期的日期部分，<xref:System.DateTime>值设置为 0001 年 1 月 1 日。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果时区信息位于`s`，将时间转换为本地时间和<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a <xref:System.DateTime> value date and time with its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含时区信息的字符串，尝试阻止转换为<xref:System.DateTime>值日期和时间与其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.
trans-unit.target: 此标志主要是阻止将本地时间到 UTC 时间的转换。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和时间符号和字符串 （例如，由特定语言星期几的名称） 中使用`s`由定义`provider`参数，则精确格式`s`如果`format`是标准的格式说明符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示用于解释的区域性`s`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象由其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`s`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns either the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the string " 5/01/2009 8:30 AM" cannot be parsed successfully when the `styles` parameter equals <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> because leading spaces are not allowed by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，字符串"5/01/2009年上午 8:30"无法成功分析时`styles`参数等于<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>因为通过不允许有前导空格`format`。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the string "5/01/2009 09:00" cannot be parsed successfully with a `format` of "MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm" because the date string does not precede the month number with a leading zero, as `format` requires.
trans-unit.target: 此外，字符串"5/01/2009年 09:00"不能与成功分析`format`的"MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm"因为日期字符串前面不带前导零的月份数作为`format`要求。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
-or-
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a date and time that corresponds to the pattern specified in <paramref name="format" />.
-or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="s" /> do not agree.
<paramref name="style" /> contains an invalid combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values.
For example, both <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" />.

In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" />方法抛出异常<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />如果要分析的字符串包含小时组成部分和 AM/PM 指示符，并不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本中，AM/PM 指示符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
An array of allowable formats of <c>s</c>.
For more information, see the Remarks section.
An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>s</c>.
A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.

Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified array of formats, culture-specific format information, and style.
The format of the string representation must match at least one of the specified formats exactly or an exception is thrown.
An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="formats" />, <paramref name="provider" />, and <paramref name="style" />.

The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式符合任一分配到的模式的日期`formats`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the string `s` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串`s`与任何定义的变体不匹配的这些模式任一`styles`参数，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Aside from comparing `s` to multiple formatting patterns, rather than to a single formatting pattern, this overload behaves identically to the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 除了比较`s`到多个格式设置模式，而不是单个的格式设置模式，此重载的行为完全相同<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数包含要分析的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`参数包含仅在时间，并没有日期，当前日期用于除非`style`参数包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，在这种情况下的默认日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`参数包含仅的日期和没有时间、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`.
trans-unit.target: `style`参数还确定是否`s`参数可以包含前导、 内部或尾随空格字符其他比允许的格式字符串在之一`formats`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用更改此行为<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，它将返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或通过使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，它将返回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含时区信息，如有必要，将时间转换为本地时间和<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用更改此行为<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志以不将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为本地时间和将设置<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `formats`参数包含数组的模式，其中`s`必须完全匹配分析操作成功。
